name: Noindex/Nofollow links
author: John Syrinek

sections.installation:
1. Upload noindex_archive to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.description: This plugin can add rel=”noindex,nofollow” to archive, tag, and category links. You can configure exactly which links are given which attributes. For instance, you could add rel=”noindex,nofollow” to all of your tag links, rel=”noindex” to all of your archive links, and nothing to your category links.

short_description: This plugin can add rel="noindex,nofollow" to archive, tag, and category links. You can configure exactly which links are given which attrib …
description: This plugin can add rel=”noindex,nofollow” to archive, tag, and category links. You can configure exactly which links are given which attributes. For instance, you could add rel=”noindex,nofollow” to all of your tag links, rel=”noindex” to all of your archive links, and nothing to your category links.
